title: Request for Body Cam Footage of DUI Arrest Involving Ievgeniia Pinchuk

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

I am writing to formally request access to the bodycam footage under the Freedom of Information Act (FOIA) related to the DUI arrest of Ievgeniia Pinchuk on December 12, 2023.

Incident Details for Footage Retrieval:

Date: December 12, 2023
Location: Main Street, Bushnell, Florida
Suspect: Ievgeniia Pinchuk, 21
Incident Summary: Pinchuk was arrested after she allegedly parked her Honda Civic on railroad tracks, leading to a CSX locomotive slamming into her vehicle. She was reportedly walking near the crash site when Sumter County sheriff’s deputies apprehended her. Pinchuk was charged with DUI and parking on railroad tracks.
I am requesting copies of all body-worn camera footage from officers who responded to the scene and interacted with Pinchuk during her arrest.

I request the following:

Bodycam footage from all responding officers.
Any related dashcam footage if available.
Any additional audio or video footage related to the arrest.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Harun

title: Request for Body Cam Footage of Incident Involving Jahniah Seawright at Valdosta Mall

communications.subject: Georgia Open Records Act Request: Request for Body Cam Footage of Incident Involving Jahniah Seawright at Valdosta Mall
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Georgia Open Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

I am writing to formally request access to the bodycam footage under the Freedom of Information Act (FOIA) related to the incident involving Jahniah Seawright at the Valdosta Mall on November 22, 2022.

Incident Details for Footage Retrieval:

Date: November 22, 2022
Location: Valdosta Mall, 1700 Norman Drive, Valdosta, Georgia
Suspect: Jahniah Seawright
Incident Summary: Seawright was arrested after threatening a store manager and providing a false name and date of birth to officers. When officers arrived at the scene, they escorted Seawright out of the store and began questioning her. After investigating, they confirmed her true identity and arrested her. Seawright was found to have five outstanding arrest warrants from multiple law enforcement agencies. She was then transported to Lowndes County Jail.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Harun

title: Email Addresses of All UMass Lowell Students, Spring 2025 Semester

communications.subject: Massachusetts Public Records Law Request: Email Addresses of All UMass Lowell Students, Spring 2025 Semester
communications.communication:
Hello,

Pursuant to the Massachusetts Public Records Law, I hereby request the university email addresses of every student registered for any number of credits in the Spring 2025 semester at UMass Lowell. This request is not for commercial purposes, nor is it a media inquiry.

Please provide this information electronically by spreadsheet, separating (or otherwise annotating) the undergraduate students from all other students. Please deliver the requested spreadsheet via email to aj@vincelli.org no later than Monday March 10th 2025 (10 business days from today).

Thank you,

AJ Vincelli
(75% she/her)

title: Request for Body Cam Footage of Incident Involving TeddyJo Marie Fliam at Walmart

communications.subject: Michigan Freedom of Information Act Request: Request for Body Cam Footage of Incident Involving TeddyJo Marie Fliam at Walmart
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Michigan Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

I am writing to formally request access to the bodycam footage under the Freedom of Information Act (FOIA) related to the incident involving TeddyJo Marie Fliam, 34, at the Walmart store on M-32 in Alpena County, Michigan, on September 29.

Incident Details for Footage Retrieval:
Date: September 29, 2022
Location: Walmart, M-32, Alpena County, Michigan
Suspect: TeddyJo Marie Fliam, 34
Incident Summary: Fliam was arrested after being accused of skipping items while using the self-checkout at the Walmart store. After being confronted by a loss prevention worker, she allegedly became agitated, denied the theft, and left the store. Surveillance footage showed that Fliam had stolen over $1,000 worth of merchandise since April by failing to scan certain items. She was later arrested at her home and charged with first-degree retail fraud.
I am requesting copies of all body-worn camera footage from officers who responded to the incident and any interactions with Fliam during her arrest.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Harun

title: Request for Body Cam Footage of Incident Involving Band Director at Jackson-Olin High School

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Alabama Open Records Law, I hereby request the following records:

I am writing to formally request access to the bodycam footage under the Freedom of Information Act (FOIA) related to the incident that occurred on September 14 involving the band director at Minor High School in Birmingham, Alabama.

Incident Details for Footage Retrieval:

Date: September 14
Location: Jackson-Olin High School football field, Birmingham, Alabama
Suspect: director at Minor High School
Incident Summary: Following the end of a football game between Jackson-Olin High School and Minor High School, the Minor High School band continued playing music for at least 18 minutes after the game concluded. The band director was confronted by police officers after refusing to stop the performance. Bodycam footage shows the band director arguing with officers and telling them to "get out of my face," before being restrained and tasered. The director was later treated at the scene and transported to a local hospital. He was charged with disorderly conduct, harassment, and resisting arrest.
I am requesting copies of all body-worn camera footage from officers who responded to the incident at Jackson-Olin High School, including any footage that shows the interaction between the band director and police officers, as well as any subsequent actions leading to his arrest.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Harun

title: Request for Body Cam Footage of Incident Involving Lindsay Shiver

communications.subject: Georgia Open Records Act Request: Request for Body Cam Footage of Incident Involving Lindsay Shiver
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Georgia Open Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

I am writing to formally request access to the bodycam footage under the Freedom of Information Act (FOIA) related to the incident involving Lindsay Shiver on July 16, where she called 911 following a dispute with her husband, Robert Shiver.
Incident Details for Footage Retrieval:
Date: July 16
Location: [Address or location of the Shiver residence]
Suspect: Lindsay Shiver
Incident Summary: Lindsay Shiver called 911 on Robert Shiver after he allegedly refused to let her hitch a ride on their private jet to meet her lover in the Bahamas. During the investigation, police discovered incriminating messages in which Lindsay allegedly wrote "Kill him" in a WhatsApp message to her lover, Newbold. Lindsay was later arrested along with two accomplices in the Bahamas on charges related to the incident.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Harun
